title: Moon Phases
guide:
### Epact Algorithm

Calculates moon age (days since New Moon).

#### Monthly Adjustment
| Month | Add | Month | Add |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Jan | 0 | Jul | 5 |
| Feb | 2 | Aug | 6 |
| Mar | 0 | Sep | 7 |
| Apr | 2 | Oct | 8 |
| May | 3 | Nov | 9 |
| Jun | 4 | Dec | 10 |

#### Phases (Age 0-29)
* **0:** New
* **1-13:** Waxing (D-shape)
* **14-15:** Full
* **16-28:** Waning (C-shape)
